title: Brand New 2 Beds 1,5 Baths Backhouse Near Culver City
posting_body: Brand New Construction Back House!
First time on the market.
Perfect for a single occupant needing an extra room for office, or two friends, or a couple!
Separate gated side entrance with common area outdoor space shared with the front house.
Beautiful 2 Beds 1,5 Baths Home with large bedrooms and a full kitchen with smart lock entry.
Use the second room as a work office if WFH.
Each bedroom and living room space has its own Heating and Cooling control for the perfect ambient temperature at home.
Modern Washer and Dryer Stacked Unit in the house.
Bedrooms have sliding mirror doors closets.
Bathrooms have mirrored medicine cabinets for extra storage space.
Open living room and kitchen layout to watch your nightly shows with stainless steel appliances such as oven, fridge, dishwasher and microwave.
Beautiful gray backsplash for the added look!
Vinyl flooring for a nice look and easy maintenance.
Everything is ground up and brand new here!
Owner did not spare anything!
Definitely a rare find!
For those of you unfamiliar with the area, this is a historic neighborhood of LA.
Extremely close to everything and central.
Walk to CJ's cafe for a brunch or mid week lunch or head to West Hollywood or Culver City with a short drive for a night out or some fun with friends!
The 10 freeway is a 2min drive so head to the beach easily or back to Downtown the other way.
The neighborhood is the quietest and safest in the area and a rising superstar in LA.
Picfair Village is a hidden gem!
Drive to Whole Foods or to Vons for your Organic Grocery needs!
Or even better the Farmer's Market by the Grove which is a 5min drive away.
Welcome home!
Available ASAP for move in!
Reach out to schedule your showing now or get access to our virtual tour.
